titleStmt.title: King Charles his funeral who was beheaded by base and barbarous hands January 30, 1648, and interred at Windsor, February 9, 1648 with his anniversaries continued untill 1659 / by Thomas Swadlin ...
titleStmt.author: Swadlin, Thomas, 1600-1670.
